long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a tool for CTIS instructors to retrieve students grades in an excel file. It stores the grades of the students whose curriculum matches the latest one. It will leave grades empty for students having old curriculum.
